page.title: 18Children's Games
page.content: We play a lot of ball games like football,cricket,tennis,rounders and spot.There are many chasing games like tiggy ,cops and robbers and links. Skipping games such as helicopter and bluebell cockelshells are popular,so are games hide and seek and blocky. During wet playtimes we play board games like snakes and ladders,or ludo,writing games include noughts and crosses.Games enjoyed on the computer include cat and mouse and connect4 .Cubs and Brownies play many games including pirates and soldiers and sticky witch. There are seasonal games such as conker fights in the autumn,sledging sliding and snowballing in the winter. There are many party games, the most popular at our school party is stir the pudding.
